info.title: Backbone Price Assessment API
info.description:
- alpha: Currently developed API version. Subject to major changes.
- beta: A semi-stable early access version. New features can be added. Breaking changes are possible.
- stable: The API is recommended for use in production.

[Changelog](https://price-assessment-api.conqore.niceshops.com/v1/docs/changelog.html)

All data is transferred in UTF-8 encoding.\
The API uses stateless HTTP. No cookies have to be kept.\
Authentication via OAuth2 client credentials flow.

[Backbone Price Assessment API PHP client @Packagist](https://packagist.org/packages/datenkraft/bb-price-assessment-api-php-client)

get.summary: Query Customer Pricing Profile collection by customer ids
get.description: Query Customer Pricing Profile collection by customer ids

parameters.name: filter[customerIds]
parameters.description: Comma seperated list of customer ids (optional)

post.summary: Add a new Customer Pricing Profile
post.description: Add a new Customer Pricing Profile. You may not use this endpoint to add stepped prices to an existing pricing profile.

get.summary: Query Customer Pricing Profile by by its id
get.description: Query Customer Pricing Profile by by its id

put.description: Update a Customer Pricing Profile. Please note, that existing stepped prices are replaced by the value you send via the request body, not supplemented.

get.summary: Query Organization Pricing Profile collection by organization ids
get.description: Query Organization Pricing Profile collection by organization ids

parameters.name: filter[organizationIds]
parameters.description: Comma seperated list of organization ids (optional)

post.summary: Add a new Organization Pricing Profile
post.description: Add a new Organization Pricing Profile. You may not use this endpoint to add stepped prices to an existing pricing profile.

get.summary: Query Organization Pricing Profile by by its id
get.description: Query Organization Pricing Profile by by its id

put.description: Update a Organization Pricing Profile. Please note, that existing stepped prices are replaced by the value you send via the request body, not supplemented.

get.description: Get Price Table for an Organization. The prices are sorted by: skuGroup:name, sku:name, validFrom, steppedPrices:validFromQuantity.

parameters.name: filter[validFrom]
parameters.description: Valid From Date filter in UTC

page.description: The page contained in this collection.

pageSize.description: The page size used for reading the collection.

percent.description: Percent (5 digits precision, 5 pre-decimal digits) Used to calculate percentages of the transmitted values, e.g. to calculate commissions.

validFrom.description: Start date from when on the price is valid. This price remains valid until a price with a more recent validFrom date is found.
